message.raw: Marked Sensor::GetNoise(unsigned int _index = 0) as deprecated from Gazebo 6.0, and updated the function to be compatible with the new Sensor::noises data type. Changed the sensors type from std::map<SensorNoiseType,NoisePtr> to std::map<int,NoisePtr> preserve compatibility with the MultiCamera sensor. This sensor creates an unbounded number of cameras, each of which has a noise model. Since we don't know how many cameras may be created, we can't enumerate them.
